Optional Adobe Postscript 3.
pxlmono driver supports UserCode/LockedPrint/SamplePrint/DocServer which equires foomatic-rip 3.43.2.14 or later. Visit Ricoh FAQ for details.
Ricoh Aficio 2075 has been certified with Mandriva Linux Limited Edition 2005, Mandriva Linux 10.1, Mandriva Linux Corporate Desktop 3.0.
Throughput 75.
